# localizedTitle

**Instance Property**

A localized title that describes the control’s action.

## Declaration

```swift
var localizedTitle: String { get }
```

## Inspecting presentation attributes

- **symbolName**: The name of the SF Symbol that represents this control.
- **localizedIndexTitles**: The titles to present for each index.

items.description: The name of the SF Symbol that represents this control.
items.name: symbolName

items.description: The titles to present for each index.
items.name: localizedIndexTitles

title: localizedTitle
